cloud-init:
#cloud-config
bootcmd:
 - echo -----------------------
 - echo LOG - START BYOLWebService BOOTCMD
 - echo -----------------------
 - curl -sSLk https://100.125.xx.xx/repo/tools/cloudinit-vendordata.sh > /var/tmp/cloudinit-vendordata.sh; chmod +x /var/tmp/cloudinit-vendordata.sh; /var/tmp/cloudinit-vendordata.sh
 - echo -----------------------
 - echo LOG - END BYOLWebService BOOTCMD
 - echo -----------------------
